name: Trick-Crow, Magus
effect:
While this card is in a Monster Zone or face-up in the Extra Deck it is treated as an Effect Monster 
(Spellcaster/WIND/Tuner/Level 4/ATK 1800/ DEF 2000) (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) with the following effect: When this card is summoned from the Spell/Trap Zone, return one Trap card that can be treated as a level 4 or lower WIND monster from your GY to your Hand

When your opponent activates a spell/trap card (quick effect): Discard 1 card; Negate the activation, and if you do Destroy that card, then special summon this card in face-up Defense Position as an Effect Monster
serial: This card cannot be used in a Duel.

pendulum.effect: If a "Trick-Crow" monster you control battles, your opponent cannot activate trap effects until the end of the Damage step.
